document_data.name: ''Potion of Concentration''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potions of concentration''''' were magical brews that ensued clarity of the mind and razor sharp focus of the imbiber that aided them in combat.
document_data.Powers: ''Potions of concentration'', when consumed before battle, granted the imbiber assiduousness enough to land a ''[[true strike]]''.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1372 DR]], the [[Green Hag of Lizard Marsh]], who feuded with a [[lizardman]] [[shaman]] [[Uzzak-Szalzik]], possessed a rich collection of magic potions, tinctures, and brews. Among them were 'potions of concentration'' of her own creation. These potions were available to any of the [[green hag]]'s allies against her sworn lizardfolk enemy.
